title: Cycle #48
content:
Rewards: 1.03704541 BTC - 70,104 sats fees = 1.03634437 to wrap

Wrapped rewards: 1.03427169 xBTC (after wrapping fees of 0.2%)

  • 30 members received 0.00871450 xBTC

  • 1692 members received 72,252.997897 STX, exchanged at 1414 sats/stx

  • 83 Boombox owners (at block height 88495) received 275.799256 STX

Achieved APY in 2022

This is the last payout of the year. Looking back, the total achieved APY with a 12-cycle locking period and 1 cool down cycle at cycle #37 is: 8.52%.

The calculation is as follows using the payout numbers published at https://pool.friedger.de/payouts/:

  • First 12 cycles achieved 4.43% (add percentages for cycle #24 to #35)

  • For 1000 STX that is 1044.3 STX at the beginning of cycle #36

  • Next 12 cycles achieved 3.92% (add percentages for cycle #37 to #48)

  • For 1044.3 STX that is 1085.2 STX at the beginning of cycle #49
